margin:0; font-family: Arial,Helvetica, sans-serif; background:#fff; font-size:15px; line-height:20px; padding-left: 2px;

td.center: Maqpower Customer Service Center Representative Section (Please Print)

td.p: The Client and Maqpower Compressor (wholly owned subsidiaries of Maqpower) agree to inspect the equipment listed per the below component inspection points. Maqpower will provide the customer with an itemized/written inspection report with critical readings and actions identified/performed during the PM inspection. Unless otherwise indicated, parts, freight, trip charge, and sales tax will be invoiced in addition to the regular PM inspection pricing quoted below. NOTE: If compressor or air dryer is covered under the Maqpower extended warranty program, it is the customerâ€™s responsibility to notify Maqpower every 2000 hours of operation for fluid analysis. Customer agrees to only use genuine Sullair parts and lubricants for units under the extended warranty. Failure to do so will void the extended warranty agreement. The Preventative Maintenance Agreement will remain in effect until cancelled in writing by either party. This PM Agreement is intended to keep your air compressor in good running condition and to minimize costly breakdowns, but does not warranty failures during this agreement due to mechanical or electrical malfunctions. The PM agreement will automatically renew each year with any applicable labor price increases. REPAIRS QUOTED SEPARATELY!

tr.td: Record running volts, amps, critical temperatures
Check drive conditions (belts/couplings) and change as needed*
Blow out Air/Oil Coolers & ACACS with air. Recommend Pressure Wash as needed*
Take Sullair Rotary Lubricant Sample (as needed)*
Check condensate drain for proper operation
Refriderated & Dessicant Dryers: Inspect Annual PM Components (replace as needed)*
Inspect/Blow out condenser coils with air
Inspect condensate traps for proper operation
Record filter pressure drop (if gauge is available)

td.center: OIL WATER SEPARATOR(OWS) SYSTEM(s) INSPECTION POINTS:

i.b: *Additional charges will apply for these repairs/services.

td.center: Personnel Authorized to Request Service (include contact numbers):
The PM service is to be performed on/about:
Should we contact you before coming out to perform PM Service?
Will you require back up while we perform PM service?*

center.b: Special instructions and client's request when performing PM Service:

td.b: Parts available on the month of the Service without shipping charges (if any). Available After Market parts are used for units 5 years old and older.
Labor rate (per hour) for any possible repair during the period of this Agreement will be equal to the labor rate (per hour) of this Agreement

center.b: CLIENT'S SYSTEM(s) COVERED BY THIS SERVICE:
